list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore(idea): update project dictionaries and workspace configuration
- add `icns` to project dictionary - adjust IntelliJ IDEA configuration for recent file paths, tasks, and npm scripts - include `generate-favicons` npm configuration

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "//wsl.localhost/Ubuntu-20.04/home/samuel/programming/blabel/snap", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "npm.Build app.executor": "Run", "npm.Generate Electron preload.executor": "Run", "npm.Generate favicons.executor": "Run", "npm.Generate web icons.executor": "Run", "npm.run.executor": "Run", "run.code.analysis.last.selected.profile": "pProject Default", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.sourceCode.HTML", "ts.external.directory.path": "\\\\wsl.localhost\\Ubuntu-20.04\\home\\samuel\\programming\\blabel\\node_modules\\typescript\\lib", "typescript.add.unambiguous.imports.on.the.fly": "true", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
refactor: update project structure and configurations for environment handling
- adjust file imports for environment files - introduce separate `environment.prod.ts` for production builds - enable conditional hashing in app routes based on environment - refine Electron main process settings (frame, icon, titleBarStyle) - rename project in metadata and package files to "Blabel" - restore `globals.d.ts` for Electron API typings - fix navbar padding and minor script adjustment in `package.json`

feat(build): update Linux packaging configuration
- add AppImage and deb targets for Linux builds - include application category as "Utility" in metadata
chore(icons): update `icon.svg` with revised dimensions and styling

refactor(backend): remove unused controllers, handlers, services, and routes
- eliminate redundant backend codebase components - cleanup includes ai-hints, translations, application-languages, and related routing files

chore(idea): add project-specific configuration files to version control
- include .gitignore for IntelliJ IDEA-specific files - add module configuration (blabel.iml) and project modules file (modules.xml)

chore(assets): add favicon assets and icons
- include multiple favicon sizes and formats (e.g., ico, icns, png, svg) - enhance asset availability for diverse platforms and resolutions

chore(package): enhance package.json and dependencies
- update author details to include structured name and email - add new script `generate-favicons` for icon conversion - add dependencies `icon-gen`, `fs-extra`, `sharp`, `svgo`, and `png-to-ico` - update package-lock.json to reflect dependency changes

feat(scripts): add script to convert SVG to favicon formats
- create `convert-icons-from-svg.ts` for SVG optimization and conversion - generate PNG, ICO, and ICNS formats from a single SVG input - integrate tools like `svgo`, `sharp`, `png-to-ico`, and `icon-gen`

feat(snap): add Snapcraft configuration for Blabel
- create `snapcraft.yaml` for packaging Blabel as a Snap - add desktop file and icon under `snap/gui` - configure strict confinement with GNOME extensions and required plugs - include stage-packages for dependencies

chore(idea): update project dictionaries and workspace configuration
- add `icns` to project dictionary - adjust IntelliJ IDEA configuration for recent file paths, tasks, and npm scripts - include `generate-favicons` npm configuration

MESSAGE.value:
refactor: update project structure and configurations for environment handling
- adjust file imports for environment files - introduce separate `environment.prod.ts` for production builds - enable conditional hashing in app routes based on environment - refine Electron main process settings (frame, icon, titleBarStyle) - rename project in metadata and package files to "Blabel" - restore `globals.d.ts` for Electron API typings - fix navbar padding and minor script adjustment in `package.json`

feat(build): update Linux packaging configuration
- add AppImage and deb targets for Linux builds - include application category as "Utility" in metadata
chore(icons): update `icon.svg` with revised dimensions and styling

refactor(backend): remove unused controllers, handlers, services, and routes
- eliminate redundant backend codebase components - cleanup includes ai-hints, translations, application-languages, and related routing files

chore(idea): add project-specific configuration files to version control
- include .gitignore for IntelliJ IDEA-specific files - add module configuration (blabel.iml) and project modules file (modules.xml)

chore(assets): add favicon assets and icons
- include multiple favicon sizes and formats (e.g., ico, icns, png, svg) - enhance asset availability for diverse platforms and resolutions

chore(package): enhance package.json and dependencies
- update author details to include structured name and email - add new script `generate-favicons` for icon conversion - add dependencies `icon-gen`, `fs-extra`, `sharp`, `svgo`, and `png-to-ico` - update package-lock.json to reflect dependency changes

feat(scripts): add script to convert SVG to favicon formats
- create `convert-icons-from-svg.ts` for SVG optimization and conversion - generate PNG, ICO, and ICNS formats from a single SVG input - integrate tools like `svgo`, `sharp`, `png-to-ico`, and `icon-gen`

feat(snap): add Snapcraft configuration for Blabel
- create `snapcraft.yaml` for packaging Blabel as a Snap - add desktop file and icon under `snap/gui` - configure strict confinement with GNOME extensions and required plugs - include stage-packages for dependencies

chore(idea): update project dictionaries and workspace configuration
- add `icns` to project dictionary - adjust IntelliJ IDEA configuration for recent file paths, tasks, and npm scripts - include `generate-favicons` npm configuration
